title: firefox 95.0.2 desktop. cant copy certificates unknown reason
content: Hi. I have mozilla firefox 95.0.2 on my personal dell laptot. No organization administrating. I cant copy certificates to a file for unknown reasons. I had password master protection on store I had read (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1175296) it could be a issue about uphold authority who creates these certificates, that i have not certificates for those authorities installed. (your internal signing certificate doesn't chain up to a trusted root, then naturally Firefox gives that UNKNOWN ISSUER error) Setting security.enterprise_roots.enabled is true but i cant change it. dont know why. But, i check and i have installed authority certificates and it wont expired until 2029 So i´m wondering if it would be an issue about master password, needed to obtain certificates and copy it I put master password to navigate so it wont be needed again but maybe firefox need to access certificates in order to copy it again and it is not asking me to provide it. Please, help. Thanks in advance.
creator: josephzucc

title: firefox does not show the font correctly
content:
Hi I’m working on a very simple asp form. I defined a class to style the <option> part of my page. This page is ok in google chrome, IE and Microsoft edge. However Firefox does not show the option font. My Firefox version is 95.0.2 and I searched a lot in google. However I didn’t find any answer. My font is “BMitra”. The screen shot and code of my page is as follows:

StyleSheet:


@font-face { 

   font-family: 'BMitra';    src: url('../fonts/BMitra.eot');    src: url('../fonts/BMitra.woff') format('woff');    src: url('../fonts/BMitra.ttf') format('truetype');    font-weight: normal;    font-style: normal;

}


body, html { 

   font-family: 'BMitra' !important;    color: lightpink;

}


.option_font { 

   font-family: 'BMitra' !important;    color: darkseagreen;    font-size: 15px;

}

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// My code: 


                       <label for="name1" style="font-size: 22px">لیست انتخاب نام</label>                        <select id="name2" class="form-control" >                                                    <option class="option_font">...</option>                            <option class="option_font">تست 1</option>                            <option class="option_font">تست2</option>                                               </select>
creator: sara.hashemi85

title: Amazon.com website left side filter options is not rendering correctly
content: Not sure why FireFox recently does not display the amazon.com left side menu options (i.e., reviews, brands, price range, etc.). It's a recent issue. I tried MS Edge from the same laptop and it rendered the amazon.com site correctly. FYI...I'm not aware that I have changed any settings. I would attach a screenshot but the Image Upload just spins forever and never completes.
creator: wmlee2645

title: How do you install Cyrillic fonts in Windows 10?
content:
Here's how to do this:

Select the Start button, and then select Settings > Time & Language > Language. ... Under Preferred languages, select Add a language. Under Choose a language to install, select or type the name of the language that you want to download and install, and then select Next. Fonts Monster
creator: carolinearthur447

title: Firefox muesta videos en imagen negra cuando hyper v esta instalado
content: Buenas noches hace unos dias instale el hyper v en un windows 10 y me di con la sorpresa de que los videos que reproducia aparecia en pantalla negra, cabe decir que videos de youtube o plataformas como amazon prime si se ven, pero por ejemplo en paginas como udemy no se ven los videos y solo se escucha el audio. Ustedes pensaran como estoy seguro de que ha sucedido este error debido al hyper v, pues el dia hoy lo desinstale y todo funciono con normalidad.
creator: cuevas135
